member.name: T:FarseerPhysics.DebugViews.DebugViewXNA
member.summary: A debug view that works in XNA. A debug view shows you what happens inside the physics engine. You can view bodies, joints, fixtures and more.

member.name: M:FarseerPhysics.DebugViews.DebugViewXNA.DrawDebugData
member.summary: Call this to draw shapes and other debug draw data.

member.name: M:FarseerPhysics.DebugViews.PrimitiveBatch.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsDevice)
member.summary: the constructor creates a new PrimitiveBatch and sets up all of the internals that PrimitiveBatch will need.

member.name: M:FarseerPhysics.DebugViews.PrimitiveBatch.Begin(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix@,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix@)
member.summary: Begin is called to tell the PrimitiveBatch what kind of primitives will be drawn, and to prepare the graphics card to render those primitives.

member.name: M:FarseerPhysics.DebugViews.PrimitiveBatch.End
member.summary: End is called once all the primitives have been drawn using AddVertex. it will call Flush to actually submit the draw call to the graphics card, and then tell the basic effect to end.
